itunes:title: When it’s get too serious - what to do!
title: When it’s get too serious - what to do!
description:
Running is a long process, that requires a lot of dedication, persistence and time. But don’t let it rob you of your youth “so to speak” we all take ourselves a little too seriously at times.. take a step back, breathe and remember tomorrow is not promised

Support the show
content:encoded:
Running is a long process, that requires a lot of dedication, persistence and time. But don’t let it rob you of your youth “so to speak” we all take ourselves a little too seriously at times.. take a step back, breathe and remember tomorrow is not promised

itunes:author: Stephen Scullion
itunes:keywords: Marathon, Nutrition, Food, Weight, Health, Self Discipline, Moderation, Balance
